p: Avenir Health applied the Spectrum Goals model [ 24], which has previously informed national strategic planning for HIV/AIDS in Zimbabwe [ 1] and other southern African countries (for example, [ 25]); Imperial College London (ICL) applied a risk-structured compartmental model of sexual HIV transmission among adults ages 15â€“49 [ 26]; and the Institute for Disease Modeling applied the EMOD-HIV individual-based model with explicit age structure (more details in Section A in S1 File).
